response.overview: The Reef is a story focused on scuba diving The Great Barrier Reef. The film explores the story of Underwater Filmmaker Tom Park in his quest to re-embrace the feeling of awe and wonder he felt on his first dive at age 12. Through Tom's story, The Reef showcases the glory of The Great Barrier Reef, and delves into the psyche of an avid scuba diver.
response.title: The Reef
